overview: Review and fix the Singlish to Go transpiler by ensuring all documentation examples compile and run correctly.
goals: Verify all Singlish examples in /docs/examples work as expected
Fix transpiler bugs preventing examples from running
Update examples if they are outdated relative to the transpiler spec

stories.title: Expand Integration Tests
stories.description: As a developer, I want the integration tests to run all examples in /docs/examples so that I have full coverage.
acceptanceCriteria: Run each file using the singlish binary
Assert that the command exits with code 0
Pass: Test discovers and runs all examples (even if some fail)

stories.title: Fix Transpiler Failures
stories.description: As a developer, I want to fix any bugs exposed by the expanded integration tests.
acceptanceCriteria: Fix the transpiler (pkg/transpiler, pkg/parser, etc.) or the example code if invalid
